abstract: Jon M. Huntsman Jr. sought to draw distinctions with his Republican rivals by calling for the United States to expand its global engagement and abandon a cold war military mindset.
snippet: Jon M. Huntsman Jr. sought to draw distinctions with his Republican rivals by calling for the United States to expand its global engagement and abandon a cold war military mindset.
lead_paragraph: HOOKSETT, N.H. - With a pledge to "erase the old map" and adopt a foreign policy to address modern threats, Jon M. Huntsman Jr. drew distinctions from his Republican rivals on Monday by calling for the United States to expand its global engagement and abandon a cold war military mindset.

headline.main: Huntsman Calls for New Foreign Policy
